item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (315 points | 64 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (249 points | 170 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (227 points | 67 comments)
4. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (237 points | 202 comments)
5. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (48 points | 7 comments)
6. Engineers Discover a 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (16 points | 3 comments)
7. Minecraft enters real world with $110M global theme park deal (23 points | 7 comments)
8. Foursquare's 104M Points of Interest (51 points | 14 comments)
9. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (437 points | 117 comments)
10. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (202 points | 28 comments)
11. 32k context length text embedding models (52 points | 15 comments)
12. Supreme Court allows multibillion-dollar class action to proceed against Meta (81 points | 36 comments)
13. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (49 points | 17 comments)
14. Prediction-Nuclear Pwr Will Be > 30% of New Installed Capacity in 10 Years in US (3 points | discuss)
15. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (60 points | discuss)
16. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (56 points | 26 comments)
17. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (21 points | 3 comments)
18. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (121 points | 40 comments)
19. Homeless people to be given cash in first major UK trial to reduce poverty (4 points | 5 comments)
20. Microsoft will soon let you clone your voice for Teams meetings (24 points | 9 comments)
21. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (47 points | 3 comments)
22. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (98 points | 42 comments)
23. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (45 points | 4 comments)
24. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (172 points | 25 comments)
25. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (89 points | 3 comments)
26. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (34 points | 2 comments)
27. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (298 points | 73 comments)
28. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (64 points | 18 comments)
29. Setting up TiddlyWiki as a BASIC programming platform (3 points | discuss)
30. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (145 points | 34 comments)
